resources.string: Are you sure ? This cannot be undone !

oRing is an app that help you managing your contraception

This channel is used to send notifications when you can remove your protection
Error, end time is not correct, please check it
You should be able to get it off at: \n
You can take your protection off !
Not wearing your protection enough can make you fertile again. Wearing it too often is not good either. If in doubt, have a spermogram and go see your doctor.
Send a notification when you can take off your protection
Multiple session have been detected. It is recommended to have one session running at the same time. Do you want to end them ?
Prevent me when a session has already started
Session with the following id has been set as finished:
